title: IBM security advisory (AV25-173)
description: Between March 24 and 30, 2025, IBM published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were critical updates for the following products:
products: IBM Cloud Pak for AIOps   version 4.1.0 to 4.8.1
IBM Data Virtualization on Cloud Pak for Data   multiple versions
IBM Maximo Application Suite - AI Broker Component   versions 9.0.5
IBM Maximo Application Suite - AI Broker   version 9.0.4
IBM Planning Analytics Cartridge for IBM Cloud Pak for Data   version 4.8.0 to 4.8.8
IBM Planning Analytics Cartridge   version 5.0.0 to 5.1.0
IBM Watson Query on Cloud Pak for Data   multiple versions
IBM Db2 on Cloud Pak for Data and Db2 Warehouse on Cloud Pak for Data   multiple versions
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
